statements: SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, horsepower, engine_size FROM car_models ORDER BY horsepower DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE length > 200 AND width < 70;
SELECT model_name, engine_size, length, width, height FROM car_models WHERE horsepower > 200;
SELECT model_name, engine_size FROM car_models WHERE engine_size BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.0 ORDER BY engine_size ASC, model_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE horsepower > 200 ORDER BY engine_size DESC;
SELECT model_name, engine_size, length FROM car_models WHERE width < 60 ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, length, height FROM car_models WHERE engine_size >= 2.0 AND length BETWEEN 170 AND 180;
SELECT model_name, engine_size, horsepower FROM car_models WHERE length > 180 AND width < 70 ORDER BY horsepower ASC;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE engine_size = 1.4 OR (width >= 60 AND length <= 170) ORDER BY width DESC, length ASC;
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, engine_specifications FROM car_models WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_address FROM manufacturer_info;
SELECT model_name FROM car_models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturer_info WHERE founding_year < 2000;
SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, engine_specifications FROM car_models WHERE model_id > 3 ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_address FROM manufacturer_info WHERE founding_year < 2000;
SELECT model_name, dimensions->'length', engine_specifications->'fuel_type' FROM car_models WHERE model_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT manufacturer_name AS Manufacturer, model_name AS Model FROM manufacturer_info INNER JOIN car_models ON manufacturer_info.manufacturer_id = car_models.model_id ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, engine_type FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, engine_size, horsepower FROM car_models WHERE horsepower > 200;
SELECT engine_id, cylinder_count, max_torque FROM engine_specifications ORDER BY engine_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, length, width, height FROM car_models JOIN car_dimensions ON car_models.model_id = car_dimensions.model_id;
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, engine_type, engine_size FROM car_models WHERE engine_type = 'V8';
SELECT model_name, engine_type, horsepower FROM car_models ORDER BY horsepower DESC;
SELECT model_name, length, width, height FROM car_models JOIN car_dimensions ON car_models.model_id = car_dimensions.model_id;
SELECT model_name, max_torque, fuel_type FROM car_models JOIN engine_specifications ON car_models.model_id = engine_specifications.model_id WHERE max_torque > 300;
SELECT * FROM CarModels;
SELECT model_name, engine_type, horsepower FROM CarModels;
SELECT engine_type, manufacturer, cylinders, max_power FROM EngineSpecifications;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM Manufacturers;
SELECT length, width, height FROM Dimensions;
SELECT model_name, engine_type, horsepower FROM CarModels WHERE engine_type = 'Diesel' ORDER BY horsepower DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM Manufacturers WHERE year_founded > 2000 ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, engine_type, engine_displacement, horsepower FROM CarModels WHERE engine_type = 'Petrol' ORDER BY engine_displacement DESC, model_name ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, year_founded, country FROM Manufacturers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY year_founded DESC;
SELECT engine_type, manufacturer, cylinders, displacement, max_power, max_torque FROM EngineSpecifications WHERE max_power > 300 ORDER BY displacement ASC;
SELECT * FROM car_models;
SELECT model_name, engine_type, year FROM car_models;
SELECT id, horsepower, torque, year FROM car_models WHERE engine_type = 'V6';
SELECT * FROM engine_specifications WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline' ORDER BY hp_per_liter DESC;
SELECT id, model_id, weight FROM dimensions WHERE length > 175 AND width < 70;
SELECT model_name, engine_type, horsepower FROM car_models WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM engine_specifications WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';

SELECT cm.model_name, es.cylinders, es.displacement, d.weight FROM car_models cm INNER JOIN engine_specifications es ON cm.engine_type = es.engine_type INNER JOIN dimensions d ON d.model_id = cm.id WHERE cm.year > 2018;

SELECT m.name AS manufacturer_name, cm.model_name, d.length, d.width, d.height FROM manufacturers m INNER JOIN car_models cm ON cm.model_name LIKE '%SUV%' INNER JOIN dimensions d ON d.model_id = cm.id WHERE m.country = 'USA';

SELECT cc.category_name, cc.description, COUNT(cm.id) AS total_models FROM car_categories cc LEFT JOIN car_models cm ON cc.id = cm.id GROUP BY cc.category_name, cc.description ORDER BY total_models DESC;
